Articles.Content:
Attaching a Science Jr. to an air craft seem to break fuel flow for air breathing engines. The fuel will only flow from a single fuel tank.

The bug can easily be reproduced with a slightly modified Velociteze stock craft. Replace the 2 structural fuselage parts with a mk1 fuel tank and a science jr.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c2cPqZ2.png[/IMG]

Yeah this is a new issue to 1.0.5

[U][URL="http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/5909"]SC9001 Science Jr. (Materials Bay) causes infinite fuel for Jet engines, in certain configurations.[/URL][/U]
